title: Personified Mascot of Fast Food Chain "Wendy's" Inside a Fanfiction

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hire either Ronald McDonald, the Burger King, or Colonel Sanders to kill your target. (You still visit the target).
- Ronald McDonald will roleblock a random visitor (prioritizing good players) and deal a basic attack, trapping them in a McDonalds kids' play-area.
- The Burger King will heal you and deal a basic attack, giving you a delicious burger.
- Colonel Sanders will deal a basic attack and clean his target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On night 4, the mascot whose ability you've used the most becomes your love interest, changing your abilities and win condition. Your abilities will be replaced by new ones.
- Ronald McDonald: At night, stalk a player. If they have a visitor, you rampage at their house with a basic attack. Win by killing everyone and rampaging at least 3 times.
- Burger King: During the day, duel a player tommorow night (same as pirate). If you win the duel, you are healed and permanently upgrade your defense one stage (and kill your victim). At night, you also deal a basic attack to one player in addition to your duel. Win by killing everyone and winning two duels.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- Colonel Sanders: At night, spread Super-Salmonella to a player, and deal a basic attack to another. When a player with Super-Salmonella visits another player or is visited by another player, they also get Super-Salmonella. When all players are infected with Super-Salmonella, you transform into the Kentucky Frier, gaining an unstoppable rampage and invincible defense. Win by transforming into the Kentucky Frier and killing all players.
- If you tie for a love interest, you don't gain a love interest until the tie is broken.

fields.name: Town Goal:
fields.value: Win with your love interest's win condition.
